lead_paragraph: A former L.L. Bean employee urges customers to consider the company’s values. Other readers raise concerns about Donald Trump’s tweet.
snippet: A former L.L. Bean employee urges customers to consider the company’s values. Other readers raise concerns about Donald Trump’s tweet....

headline.main: L.L. Bean: A Boycott and a Tweet (From Guess Who?)
